articles.title: Covid: New heavily mutated variant B.1.1.529 in South Africa raises concern
articles.description: Scientists are closely watching a new variant circulating in South Africa - but there are few clear answers.
articles.content:
James GallagherHealth and science correspondent@JamesTGallagheron Twitter
Image source, Getty Images
We're back in familiar territory - growing concern about a new variant of coronavirus.

articles.title: Channel migrants: UK officials head to France for talks after tragedy
articles.description: Home Secretary Priti Patel says there is "no quick fix" to stop Channel crossings following the tragedy.
articles.content:
By Doug FaulknerBBC News
The UK and France have held "positive" talks on tackling trafficking following the deaths of 27 people in the Channel, a government source has told the BBC.

articles.title: Macy's Thanksgiving Parade: Baby Yoda and Snoopy delight crowds
articles.description: Thousands turn out to enjoy the annual parade with millions more watching on television.
articles.content:
A cast of colourful characters returned to the New York skies on Thursday, delighting thousands who packed the streets for the annual Macy's Thanksgiving Parade.
